title: Quiz - SchemesTap - 01st to 15th February 2023
instruction: The TDF Scheme extends financial support and expertise to upgrade existing products/ systems, processes and its applications by reducing production costs, improving functionality and quality by promoting Make in India, and the development of futuristic technologies with defence applications. The Scheme enlists requirements of Service Headquarters of upgrading products/ systems and futuristic defence technologies as Projects for which eligible stakeholders can apply through this platform.

quiz.text: The scheme discussed in the paragraph is being implemented by which of the following ministries?
options: Ministry of Communications
Ministry of Information and Broadcasting
Ministry of Housing and Urban Affairs
Ministry of Road Transport & Highways
None of the above

quiz.text: What is the duration of the scheme?
options: Up to 2025-26
Up to 2026-27
Up to 2024-25
Up to 2027-28
None of the above

quiz.text:
Which of the following statements is/are correct with respect to the above scheme?

A. The increase coverage of AIR FM transmitters in the country will be 66% by geographical area.

B. The increase coverage of AIR FM transmitters in the country will be 60% by population.

C. Free distribution of over 8 lakh DD Free Set Up Boxes to people living in remote, tribal, LWE and border areas.
options: A and C
Only B
B and C
All of the above
None of the above

quiz.text: With respect to the above-mentioned scheme, which of the following options is incorrect in terms of the distribution of financial outlay of the scheme?
options: The financial outlay for Interest Subvention Component to be contributed by DAHD is Rs. 1,167 Crore
The financial outlay for Loan Component by NABARD is Rs. 8,004 Crore
Contribution by eligible end borrower is Rs. 2001 Crore
Joint Contribution by NDDB & NCDC is Rs. 12 Crore
All are correct.

quiz.text: What is the maximum loan provided under the scheme?
options: 50%
60%
70%
80%
100%

quiz.text: Which of the following statements is/are correct with respect to the above scheme?
options: Government of India to provide interest subvention up to 2.5 % to NABARD
Repayment period is 10 years with initial one year moratorium
The end borrowers will get loan @7.5 % per annum
Only B and C
All of the above

quiz.text: What is the estimated financial outlay of the scheme mentioned in the above paragraph?
options: Rs. 17,490 Crore
Rs. 1,466 Crore
Rs. 4,077 Crore
Rs. 2,823.4 Crore
None of the above

quiz.text:
Which of the followings is/are the objectives of the scheme?

A. Develop underwater vehicles and underwater robotics.

B. Provide Ocean climate change advisory services.

C. Identify technology innovations and conservation methods.
options: Only A
Only B
Both A and B
Both A and C
All of the above

quiz.text: Which of the followings is not a component of the above scheme?
options: Create Awareness
Deep Ocean Survey
Advance Marine station for Ocean Biology
Development of the coastal lines
All are correct

quiz.text:
Which of the following statements is/are correct with respect to the above scheme?

A. It is being implemented by Ministry of Electronics and Information Technology.

B. It was launched in the year 2015.

C. The Digital India programme is centered on four key vision areas.
options: A and B
A and C
B and C
A, B and C
None of the above

quiz.text:
Which of the following statements is/are correct with respect to the programme management structure of the above scheme?

A. A Monitoring Committee headed by the Minister of Communications and IT.

B. A Digital India Advisory Group chaired by PM.

C. An Apex Committee chaired by the Cabinet Secretary.
options: Only A
Only B
Only C
Both A and B
Both A and C

quiz.text: Which among is not of the key pillars of the Digital India scheme.
options: Broadband Highways
e-Kranti
Early Harvest Programmes
Private Internet Access Programme
Universal Access to Mobile Connectivity

quiz.text:
With respect to the scheme mentioned in the above paragraph, identify the correct statement:

A. It was launched in 2019.

B. It is under the Department if Drinking /water & Sanitation.

C.     The aim is to ensure cleanliness in villages by converting bio-waste into resources.
options: Only A
Only B
Only C
Both A and B
Both B and C

quiz.text: What does ‘G’ in GOBARdhan stands for?
options: Good
Green
Galvanising
Ghar
Government

quiz.text: Which of the following statements is correct with respect to the scheme?
options: The scheme will reduce GHG emission.
There are 3 types of Project Models designed by the government.
The biogas generated by the clusters can be used in industries.
This will help increase the import of crude oil.
Both 2 and 4

quiz.text:
Which of the following statements is/are correct with respect to the above scheme?

A. Ministry of Commerce and Industry is the nodal ministry for the scheme.

B. It was launched in the year 2020.

C. It is a centrally sector scheme.
options: A and B
A and C
B and C
A, B and C
None of the above

quiz.text: The Indian Footwear and Leather Development Programme (IFLDP) which was earlier known as Indian Footwear, Leather and Accessories Development Programme has been approved for continuation from 2021-22 till 31st March, _______.
options: 2023
2024
2025
2026
2027

quiz.text: Which one of the following are the sub-scheme under the above mentioned scheme?
options: Sustainable Technology and Environmental Promotion
Integrated Development of Leather Sector
Establishment of Institutional Facilities
Brand Promotion of Indian Brands in Footwear and Leather Sector
All of the above

quiz.text:
Which of the following statements is/are correct with respect to Krishi UDAN 2.0?

A. It has been formulated with support from ‘AAI Cargo Logistics and Allied Services Company Limited.’

B. Krishi UDAN 2.0 focuses mainly on the Southern Indian states.

C. Central government will encourage states to reduce sales tax to 1% on aviation turbine fuel.
options: A and B
A and C
B and C
A, B and C
None of the above

quiz.text: Which of the following statements is incorrect with respect to the above scheme?
options: Full waiver of airport charges would be granted even if the agricultural cargo is less than 50% of the total chargeable weight carried
Centre will facilitate the development of hub and spoke model to create cargo terminals at the airports
An online platform, E-Kushal (Krishi Udaan for Sustainable Holistic Agri-Logistics) to be developed for coordinating, monitoring and evaluating
There are 12 focus routes under this scheme
Convergence of E-Kushal to be done with the National Agriculture Market (e-NAM)

quiz.text: As on July 2022, how many airports have been included under the above-mentioned scheme?
options: 53
58
62
66
71

quiz.text:
Which of the following statements is/are correct with respect to the above scheme?

A. It is being implemented by Ministry of Rural Development.

B. At least one-third beneficiaries shall be women.

C. A minimum of 10 job seekers should apply for sanction of new work under MGNREGS.
options: A and B
A and C
B and C
A, B and C
None of the above

quiz.text:
Which of the following statements is/are correct with respect to the above scheme?

A. Work should be provided with 5 km radius of the village.

B. A 75:25 wage and material ratio is to be maintained.

C. Unemployment allowance will be provided in case employment is not provided within fourteen days.
options: Only A
A and C
B and C
A, B and C
A and B

quiz.text: What is the minimum guaranteed unskilled wage employment in days in areas facing drought/ natural calamity
options: 100 days
125 days
150 days
175 days
200 days

quiz.text:
Which of the following statements is/are correct with respect to the above scheme?

A. Department of Commerce coordinates action plans for service sectors.

B. It was launched in the year 2015.

C. Department for Promotion of Industry and Internal trade (DPIIT) coordinates action plans for manufacturing sectors.
options: A and B
A and C
B and C
A, B and C
None of the above

quiz.text: Which among the following is not one of the pillars under the scheme mentioned in the above paragraph?
options: New Processes
New Technologies
New Mindset
New Sectors
New Infrastructure

quiz.text: Which among the following are the targets under the scheme mentioned in the above paragraph?
options: Target an increase in manufacturing sector growth to 12-14% per annum over the medium term.
An increase in the share of manufacturing in the country’s Gross Domestic Product from 16% to 33% by 2022.
To create 50 million additional jobs by 2022 in manufacturing sector
2 & 3 only
1, 2 and 3

quiz.text:
Which of the following statements are correct with reference to the National Handloom Development Programme?

A. NHDP has been formulated for its implementation during financial year 2021-22 to 2030-31.

B. The scheme will follow need-based approach for integrated and holistic development of handlooms and welfare of handloom weavers.

C. The scheme will support weavers, both within and outside the cooperative fold including Self Help Groups.
options: A only
B only
A and B only
B and C only
A, B and C

quiz.text:
Which of the following are the components of the National Handloom Development Programme?

A. Cluster Development Programme

B. Handloom Marketing Assistance

C. Infrastructure & Special Projects

D. Mega Handloom Cluster

E. Concessional Credit/ Weaver MUDRA Scheme
options: A, B, C and D
B, C, D and E
A, B, D and E
A, C, D and E
A, B, C, D and E

quiz.text: Which of the following are the objectives of the National Handloom Development Programme?
options: To focus on brand building of handloom under India Handloom Brand
To ensure availability of concessional credit to handloom weavers.
To ensure preservation and archiving of traditional designs
1 and 2 only
All 1, 2 and 3

quiz.text: Which of the following is the implementing agency of the scheme mentioned in the above paragraph?
options: State Animal Husbandry Department
Department of Animal Husbandry and Dairying
Farmers Produce Organisations
Gokulgrams
None of the above

quiz.text: Which of the following is not an objective of the above-mentioned scheme?
options: Increasing availability of fodder and feed to substantially reduce the demand.
Encouraging establishment of fodder processing units.
Capacity building of state functionaries and livestock owners.
Promoting allied research in prioritized areas of poultry, sheep, goat, feed and fodder.
All of the above are objectives

quiz.text: Which of the following statements is correct with respect to the scheme?
options: Under sub-mission on feed and fodder development, one-time 50% subsidy will be provided.
Under sub-mission on breed development of livestock and poultry, one-time 100% subsidy will be provided.
Under sub-mission on innovation and extension, onetime 100% subsidy will be provided.
Both 1 and 2
All of the above

quiz.text:
Which of the following statements is/are correct with respect to the above scheme?

A. Ministry of Women and Child Development is the nodal ministry for the scheme.

B. It was launched in the year 2017.

C. It is a centrally sponsored scheme.
options: A and B
A and C
B and C
A, B and C

quiz.text:
Which of the following services are offered under the Palna Scheme?

A. Day-care facilities including sleeping facilities.

B. Early simulation for children below three years and pre-school education for 3-6 years old children.

C. Health check-up without immunization.
options: A and B
A and C
B and C
A, B and C
None of the above

quiz.text: Under the newly approved Mission Shakti, the _________ has been revised and subsumed as Palna scheme.
options: National Creche Scheme
Suman Scheme
Janani Suraksha Yojana
Beti Bachao Beti Padhao Scheme
None of the above

quiz.text:
Which of the following statements is/are correct with respect to the above scheme?

A. It is being implemented by Ministry of Food Processing Industries.

B. It was launched in the year 2021.

C. The Production Linked Incentive (PLI) Scheme for Food Processing Industry has only 3 components.
options: A and B
A and C
B and C
A, B and C
None of the above

options: Rs. 8500 Crore
Rs. 9700 Crore
Rs. 10900 Crore
Rs. 12500 Crore
Rs. 14000 Crore

quiz.text:
Which among the following statements are correct with respect to the scheme mentioned in the above paragraph?

A. Scheme will be implemented over a five year.

B. Applicants will be extended grant @50% of expenditure on branding & marketing abroad subject to a maximum grant of 3% of Sales of food products or Rs 75 crore per year, whichever is less.

C. It will create employment for nearly 2.5 lakh persons by the year 2025-26.
options: A and B
A and C
B and C
A, B and C
None of the above

quiz.text:
Which among the following statements are correct with respect to the scheme mentioned in the above paragraph?

A. The tenure of the PLI Scheme is five years (FY 2021-22 to FY 2025-26).

B. Support under the Scheme shall be provided to companies engaged in manufacturing of target segments anywhere in India and abroad.

C. The scheme shall extend an incentive of 4% to 6% on incremental sales (over base year) of goods manufactured in India or abroad.
options: A and B
A and C
B and C
A, B and C
None of the above

options: A and B

options: Coated/Plated Steel Products
High Strength/wear resistant steel
Specialty Rails
Alloy Steel Products and steel wires
All of the above

options: 2022-23
2023-24
2024-25
2025-26

60%

quiz.text: Which of the following statements is/are not correct regarding the above-mentioned scheme?
options: 50% financial assistance is provided by World Bank
The aim is to bring down stunting among age group 0-6 years from 38.4% to 30%
The scheme is under the Ministry of Women and Child Development
All of the above
None of the above

quiz.text: Which of the following statements is correct with respect to the scheme?
options: The aim is to reduce the under nutrition among young children, women and adolescent girls by 3%
The aim is to reduce the stunting among young children, women and adolescent girls by 2%
The aim is to reduce the low- birth weight among young children, women and adolescent girls by 3%
Only 1 and 3
All of the above

quiz.text: With respect to the above-mentioned scheme, which of the followings are the beneficiaries under the scheme?
options: AAY Households
PHH
Only 1 and 2
All beneficiaries who possess a ration card
All of the above

quiz.text: How many beneficiaries (in crores) will be targeted under the scheme?
options: 50.4
63.9
74.3
81.35
None of the above

quiz.text: Which of the following statements is/are incorrect with respect to the above scheme?
options: Free food grains will be provided only for the year 2023.
It will subsume 3 subsidy schemes
The government will spend more than 2 lakh crore in 2023 as food subsidy under NFSA and other welfare schemes
All are Correct
All are incorrect

quiz.text:
Which of the following statements is/are correct with respect to the above scheme?

A. It is being implemented by Ministry of Jal Shakti.

B. It was launched in the year 2016.

C. Funding of Rs 50,000 crores for a period of 5 years (2020-21 to 2025-26) has been provided.
options: A and B

Which of the following schemes have been merged under the scheme mentioned in the above paragraph?

B. Integrated Watershed Management Programme (IWMP)

C. On Farm Water Management (OFWM)
options: A and B
A and C

None of the above

PMKSY – Har Khet Ko Pani (HKKP)

All households of Rural Areas
SECC- 2011 beneficiaries
All of the above are beneficiaries.
None of the above are beneficiaries.

options: Solar PhotoVoltaic based standalone systems will also include repair and maintenance for 5 years.
Camps in villages/ cluster of villages for on spot registration
All DISCOMS are eligible for finance assistance.

10 lakh

Which of the following statements is/are correct with respect to the above scheme?

options: 10,000 MW
20,000 MW
30,000 MW

quiz.text: With respect to the above-mentioned scheme, which of the followings is the nodal ministry?
options: Ministry of Civil Aviation
Ministry of Road, Transport & Highways

quiz.text:
Which of the following statements is/are correct regarding the scheme?

A. Grant up to 75% of the cost of agriculture Drone to individuals

B. Grant up to 100% of the drones with max ceiling of Rs. 10 Lakh per drone to FPOs.

C. Grant up to 50% of the drones with max ceiling of Rs. 5 Lakh per drone to Agriculture Graduates for establishing Custom Hiring Centres.
options: Only A
Only B
Both A and B
Both A and C
None of the above

quiz.text: What does T stands for in the TDF scheme?
options: Technical
Technology
Telecom
Terminal

quiz.text: Which of the following is the implementing agency of the above denoted scheme?
options: Hindustan Aeronautics Limited
Defence Research and Development Organisation
Council of Scientific and Industrial Research

quiz.text: Which of the following entities will not be eligible under the above-mentioned scheme?
options: Entity with excess of 49% foreign investment
A startup registered in India
A industry controlled by a Resident Indian citizen
Sole proprietorship registered as per applicable Indian laws
None of the above
